dcterms:creator: D. Luo
W. Cheng
D. Xu
W. Yu
B. Zong
H. Chen
X. Zhang
dcterms:description: A binary classification dataset where each graph incorporates a Barabasi-Albert base structure linked with either a house or five-cycle motif. The label and ground-truth explanation of a graph is determined by the motif the graph contains.
dcterms:title: BA-2Motifs

dcterms:creator: K. Amara
M. El-Assady
R. Ying
dcterms:description: A dataset similar to BA-2Motifs but with two distinct motifs, house and 3 × 3 grid. The house and grid motifs are chosen because they do not have overlapping structures.
dcterms:title: BA-HouseGrid

dcterms:creator: Y.-X. Wu
X. Wang
A. Zhang
X. He
T.-S. Chua
dcterms:description: The dataset contains graphs combining a base structure (Tree, Ladder, or Wheel) and a motif (Cycle, House, Crane). A spurious correlation between the base and the motif is manually injected into each graph.
dcterms:title: SPMotif

dcterms:creator: K. Amara
M. El-Assady
R. Ying
dcterms:description: Each graph is a Barabási structure that may be linked with either house or grid motifs. Graphs containing both motif types are labeled as 1, otherwise 0.
dcterms:title: BA-HouseAndGrid

dcterms:creator: K. Amara
M. El-Assady
R. Ying
dcterms:description: Similar to BA-HouseAndGrid, however, graphs with either house or grid motifs are labeled as 1, otherwise 0.
dcterms:title: BA-HouseOrGrid

dcterms:creator: J. Kazius
R. McGuire
R. Bursi
dcterms:description: The dataset is a molecular property prediction task, which is to identify if a molecule is mutagenic or not. The functional groups -NO2 and -NH2 are considered as ground-truth explanations that lead to mutagenicity.
dcterms:title: Mutagenic

dcterms:creator: B. Sanchez-Lengeling
J. Wei
B. Lee
E. Reif
P. Wang
W. Qian
K. McCloskey
L. Colwell
A. Wiltschko
dcterms:description: The dataset contains 12000 molecular graphs extracted from ZINC15. The task is to determine the presence of benzene rings in a molecule. Ground-truth explanations are the carbon atoms in the benzene rings.
dcterms:title: Benzene

dcterms:creator: F. Monti
D. Boscaini
J. Masci
E. Rodola
J. Svoboda
M. M. Bronstein
dcterms:description: An image classification dataset where each image in MNIST is converted to a superpixel graph. Each node represents a superpixel where node features are the superpixel’s central coordinate and brightness intensity.
dcterms:title: MNIST75SP

dcterms:creator: H. Yuan
H. Yu
J. Wang
K. Li
S. Ji
dcterms:description: The datasets are sentiment classification tasks. Each node corresponds to one word in the text, edges are constructed by the Biaffine parser.
dcterms:title: GraphSST2

dcterms:creator: H. Yuan
H. Yu
J. Wang
K. Li
S. Ji
dcterms:description: The datasets are sentiment classification tasks. Each node corresponds to one word in the text, edges are constructed by the Biaffine parser.
dcterms:title: Twitter
